entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 14 April 2023
